transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello. Haan. Sri Krishna Enterprises?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Indra sir very good afternoon Jinsi India Mart Noida office se.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Sir aapne ek concern raise kiya tha kal hamara toll free pe call karke kuch issues bataya tha. Lehane on the call aapko address kiya tha.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: But abhi hame identify nahi ho pa rahe aapka kya tha issue ye proper way pe hum logo ne answer kar paya.
Customer: Achcha achcha madam thoda sa ek kam me hu mai system me baith ke aapko call karata hu.
Executive: Actually sir dekho agar aapka problem sort out ho gaya issue concern ho gaya to mujhe.
Customer: System sort out nahi hua hai mai aapko call karunga. System par.
Executive: So mai kab tak ha mai kab tak aapka call ka intzar karu sir?
Customer: Ek ghante ke andar call karta hu aapko.
Executive: Thik hai ek ghante ke baad mera ko bol deti hu aap hi ko phone mila ke.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai thik hai. Okay sir thank you call.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's issue was not resolved on previous call.



Resolution:

- Executive asked when to expect a call back.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call back within an hour.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- previous call, issue, call back
